info.title: Nutrition E-commerce API Documentation
info.description: Apis to perform various actions on resources

get.description: Fetches a list of all categories.

post.description: Allows users to add a new product category.

status.description: Product status: 1 for active, 0 for inactive.

put.description: Updates an existing category by ID. The name must be unique but ignores the current category's ID.

get.description: Fetches all customers from the database. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter customers by status. Allowed values: active, inactive

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have permission

post.description: Registers a new customer with a default role of 'customer'. Requires authentication.

get.description: Fetches details of a specific customer by ID.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: ID of the customer to fetch

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of all available products

post.description: Creates a new product and returns the created product details

get.description: Fetches details of a specific product by ID.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: ID of the product to fetch

put.description: Updates the status of a product to either active (1) or inactive (0).

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: ID of the product to update

status.description: Product status: 1 for active, 0 for inactive.
